I know another long shot.  

But where did all the American Beauty's go?  

I have this Sheckard Glove Showing AB460 available for swap.  only 20 graded only 3 higher.  Looking to SWAP for one or more of the following American Beauty 460 backs.  I will purchase from you as well if you can help out:

ABSTEIN Blue Sleeves
CAMNITZ Hands Above Head
LEACH Bending Over
LEIFIELD Batting

+/- Cash on top of the trade for condition offsets/additions.  

Thanks for looking!

Cliff
